Common css snippets

This is a collection of some css snippets that are/can be used commonly. The purpose of this is not to be a full list, but rather implement some basic css for reference and maybe even use.

Imports

../generators

Types

CssAll = enum
  initial = "initial", inherit = "inherit", unset = "unset"
CssColour = enum
  AliceBlue, AntiqueWhite, Aqua, Aquamarine, Azure, Beige, Bisque, Black,
  BlanchedAlmond, Blue, BlueViolet, Brown, BurlyWood, CadetBlue, Chartreuse,
  Chocolate, Coral, CornflowerBlue, Cornsilk, Crimson, Cyan, DarkBlue, DarkCyan,
  DarkGoldenrod, DarkGray, DarkGreen, DarkGrey, DarkKhaki, DarkMagenta,
  DarkOliveGreen, DarkOrange, DarkOrchid, DarkRed, DarkSalmon, DarkSeaGreen,
  DarkSlateBlue, DarkSlateGray, DarkSlateGrey, DarkTurquoise, DarkViolet,
  DeepPink, DeepSkyBlue, DimGray, DodgerBlue, FireBrick, FloralWhite,
  ForestGreen, Fuchsia, Gainsboro, GhostWhite, Gold, Goldenrod, Gray, Green,
  GreenYellow, Grey, Honeydew, HotPink, IndianRed, Indigo, Ivory, Khaki,
  Lavender, LavenderBlush, LawnGreen, LemonChiffon, LightBlue, LightCoral,
  LightCyan, LightGoldenrodYellow, LightGray, LightGreen, LightGrey, LightPink,
  LightSalmon, LightSeaGreen, LightSkyBlue, LightSlateGray, LightSlateGrey,
  LightSteelBlue, LightYellow, Lime, LimeGreen, Linen, Magenta, Maroon,
  MediumAquamarine, MediumBlue, MediumOrchid, MediumPurple, MediumSeaGreen,
  MediumSlateBlue, MediumSpringGreen, MediumTurquoise, MediumVioletRed,
  MidnightBlue, MintCream, MistyRose, Moccasin, NavajoWhite, Navy, OldLace,
  Olive, OliveDrab, Orange, OrangeRed, Orchid, PaleGoldenrod, PaleGreen,
  PaleTurquoise, PaleVioletRed, PapayaWhip, PeachPuff, Peru, Pink, Plum,
  PowderBlue, Purple, RebeccaPurple, Red, RosyBrown, RoyalBlue, SaddleBrown,
  Salmon, SandyBrown, SeaGreen, Seashell, Sienna, Silver, SkyBlue, SlateBlue,
  SlateGray, SlateGrey, Snow, SpringGreen, SteelBlue, Tan, Teal, Thistle,
  Tomato, Turquoise, Violet, Wheat, White, WhiteSmoke, Yellow, YellowGreen
Enum for all css colour presets. 
CssContentAlignment = enum
  stretch = "stretch", center = "center", flexStart = "flex-start",
  flexEnd = "flex-end", spaceBetween = "space-between",
  spaceAround = "space-around", spaceEvenly = "space-evenly"
CssDisplay = enum
  inline = "inline", `block` = "block", contents = "contents", flex = "flex",
  gird = "grid", inlineBlock = "inline-block", inlineFlex = "inline-flex",
  inlineGrid = "inline-grid", inlineTable = "inline-table",
  listItem = "list-item", runIn = "run-in", table = "table",
  tableCaption = "table-caption", tableColumnGroup = "table-column-group",
  tableHeaderGroup = "table-column-group",
  tableFooterGroup = "table-footer-group", tableRowGroup = "table-row-group",
  tableCell = "table-cell", tableColumn = "table-column",
  tableRow = "table-row", none = "none"
CssFontFamily = enum
  sansSerif = "sans-serif", serif = "serif", monospace = "monospace",
  cursive = "cursive", fantasy = "fantasy", caption = "caption", icon = "icon",
  menu = "menu", messageBox = "message-box", smallCaption = "small-caption",
  statusBar = "status-bar"
CssFontStretch = enum
  normal = "normal", ultraCondensed = "ultra-condensed",
  extraCondensed = "extra-condensed", condensed = "condensed",
  semiCondensed = "semi-condensed", semiExpanded = "semi-expanded",
  expanded = "expanded", extraExpanded = "extra-expanded",
  ultraExpanded = "ultra-expanded"
CssFontStyle = enum
  normal = "normal", italic = "italic", oblique = "oblique"
CssFontVariant = enum
  normal = "normal", smallCaps = "small-caps"
CssFontWeight = enum
  normal = "normal", bold = "bold", bolder = "bolder", lighter = "lighter",
  weight100 = "100", weight200 = "200", weight300 = "300", weight400 = "400",
  weight500 = "500", weight600 = "600", weight700 = "700", weight800 = "800",
  weight900 = "900"
CssItemsAlignment = enum
  normal = "normal", stretch = "stretch", center = "center",
  flexStart = "flex-start", flexEnd = "flex-end", start = "start",
  `end` = "end", baseline = "baseline"
CssPosition = enum
  `static` = "static", relative = "relative", fixed = "fixed",
  absolute = "absolute", sticky = "sticky"
CssPositioning = enum
  bottom = "bottom", clip = "clip", left = "left", position = "position",
  right = "right", top = "top"
CssSize = enum
  xxSmall = "xx-small", xSmall = "x-small", small = "small", medium = "medium",
  large = "large", xLarge = "x-large", xxLarge = "xx-large", larger = "larger",
  smaller = "smaller"
CssVisibility = enum
  visible = "visible", hidden = "hidden", collapse = "collapse"

Procs

proc accentColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Specifies an accent color for user-interface controls 
proc alignContent(value: string | CssContentAlignment): CssAttribute
proc alignItems(value: string | CssItemsAlignment): CssAttribute
proc alignSelf(value: string | CssItemsAlignment): CssAttribute
proc all(value: string | CssAll): CssAttribute
proc aspectRatio(value: Rational): CssAttribute
proc aspectRatio(value: string): CssAttribute {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
proc aspectRatio(x, y: string | SomeInteger): CssAttribute
proc backgroundColour(value: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Specifies the background color of an element 
proc border(values: string): CssAttribute {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc borderBlockColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of the borders at start and end in the block direction 
proc borderBlockEndColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of the border at the end in the block direction 
proc borderBlockStartColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of the border at the start in the block direction 
proc borderBottomColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of the bottom border 
proc borderColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of the four borders 
proc borderInlineColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of the borders at start and end in the inline direction 
proc borderInlineEndColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of the border at the end in the inline direction 
proc borderInlineStartColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of the border at the start in the inline direction 
proc borderLeftColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of the left border 
proc borderRightColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of the right border 
proc borderTopColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of the top border 
proc bottom(value: string | SomeNumber): CssAttribute
proc caretColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Specifies the color of the cursor (caret) in inputs, text-areas, or any element that is editable 
proc ch(size: SomeNumber): string
Relative to the width of the "0" (zero) 
proc cm(size: SomeNumber): string
Centimeters 
proc colour(value: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of text 
proc columnRuleColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Specifies the color of the rule between columns 
proc display(value: string | CssDisplay): CssAttribute
proc em(size: SomeNumber): string
Relative to the font-size of the element (2em means 2 times the size of the current font) 
proc ex(size: SomeNumber): string
Relative to the x-height of the current font (rarely used) 
proc fontFamily(family: string | CssFontFamily): CssAttribute
proc fontSize(size: string | CssSize): CssAttribute
proc fontStretch(stretch: string | CssFontStretch): CssAttribute
proc fontStyle(style: string | CssFontStyle): CssAttribute
proc fontVariant(variant: string | CssFontVariant): CssAttribute
proc fontWeight(weight: string | CssFontWeight): CssAttribute
proc height(number: string | SomeNumber): CssAttribute
proc `in`(size: SomeNumber): string
Inches (1in = 96px = 2.54cm) 
proc inch(size: SomeNumber): string
Inches (1in = 96px = 2.54cm) 
proc left(value: string | SomeNumber): CssAttribute
proc maxHeight(number: string | SomeNumber): CssAttribute
proc maxWidth(number: string | SomeNumber): CssAttribute
proc mm(size: SomeNumber): string
Millimeters 
proc outlineColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Sets the color of an outline 
proc padding(size: string | SomeInteger): CssAttribute
proc pc(size: SomeNumber): string
Picas (1pc = 12 pt) 
proc position(position: string | CssPosition | CssPositioning): CssAttribute
proc pt(size: SomeNumber): string
Points (1pt = 1/72 of 1in) 
proc px(size: SomeNumber): string
Pixels (1px = 1/96th of 1in) 
proc rem(size: SomeNumber): string
Relative to font-size of the root element 
proc rgb(red, green, blue: SomeFloat): string

Converts red, green and blue values to css string.

Takes values between 0.0 and 1.0

proc rgb(red, green, blue: SomeInteger): string

Converts red, green and blue values to css string.

Takes values between 0 and 255

proc rgba(red, green, blue, alpha: SomeFloat): string

Converts red, green, blue and alpha values to css string.

Takes values between 0.0 and 1.0

proc rgba(red, green, blue: SomeInteger; alpha: SomeFloat): string

Converts red, green, blue and alpha values to css string.

Takes values between 0 and 255 (alpha: 0.0 .. 1.0)

proc right(value: string | SomeNumber): CssAttribute
proc scrollbarColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Specifies the color of the scrollbar of an element 
proc setAccentColour(element: CssElement; colour: string | CssColour): CssElement
Specifies an accent color for user-interface controls 
proc setBackgroundColour(element: CssElement; colour: string | CssColour): CssElement
Specifies the background color of an element 
proc setBorderBlockColour(element: CssElement; colour: string | CssColour): CssElement
Sets the color of the borders at start and end in the block direction 
proc setBorderBlockEndColour(element: CssElement; colour: string | CssColour): CssElement
Sets the color of the border at the end in the block direction 
proc setBorderBlockStartColour(element: CssElement; colour: string | CssColour): CssElement
Sets the color of the border at the start in the block direction

Sets the color of the bottom border

Sets the color of the four borders

proc setCaretColour(element: CssElement; colour: string | CssColour): CssElement
Specifies the color of the cursor (caret) in inputs, text-areas, or any element that is editable 
proc setColour(element: CssElement; colour: string | CssColour): CssElement
Sets the color of text 
proc setColumnRuleColour(element: CssElement; colour: string | CssColour): CssElement
Specifies the color of the rule between columns 
proc setDisplay(element: CssElement; value: string | CssDisplay): CssDisplay
proc setFont(element: CssElement; fontValues: varargs[string]): CssElement {.
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}

Shortcut for adding multiple things to a font.

You have to call the $ procedure on any Css type.

proc setFontFamily(element: CssElement; family: string | CssFontFamily): CssElement
proc setFontSize(element: CssElement; size: string | CssSize): CssElement
proc setFontStretch(element: CssElement; stretch: string | CssFontStretch): CssElement
proc setFontStyle(element: CssElement; style: string | CssFontStyle): CssElement
proc setFontVariant(element: CssElement; variant: string | CssFontVariant): CssElement
proc setFontWeight(element: CssElement; weight: string | CssFontWeight): CssElement
proc setHeight(element: CssElement; number: string | SomeNumber): CssElement
proc setMaxHeight(element: CssElement; number: string | SomeNumber): CssElement
proc setMaxWidth(element: CssElement; number: string | SomeNumber): CssElement
proc setOutlineColour(element: CssElement; colour: string | CssColour): CssElement
Sets the color of an outline 
proc setPadding(element: CssElement; value: string | SomeInteger): CssDisplay
proc setScrollbarColour(element: CssElement; colour: string | CssColour): CssElement
Specifies the color of the scrollbar of an element 
proc setTextDecorationColour(element: CssElement; colour: string | CssColour): CssElement
Specifies the color of the text-decoration 
proc setVisibility(element: CssElement; value: string | CssVisibility): CssDisplay
proc setWidth(element: CssElement; number: string | SomeNumber): CssElement
proc textAlign(direction: string): CssAttribute {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
proc textDecorationColour(colour: string | CssColour): CssAttribute
Specifies the color of the text-decoration 
proc top(value: string | SomeNumber): CssAttribute
proc visibility(value: string | CssVisibility): CssAttribute
proc vw(size: SomeNumber): string
Relative to 1% of the width of the viewportCssSize 
proc width(number: string | SomeNumber): CssAttribute
